description: Explore the area from beyond the park boundary in the north to Dickson Lake in the south, and from Cedar Lake in the west to Grand Lake in the east. Additional area covered is the Petawawa River to McManus Lake at the east boundary of the Park. Explore the Brent Crater, the largest of its kind in the world and learn about the Algonquin's wolves. Includes campsites, portages, access points, hiking trails and more.
name: Adventure Map Algonquin 4-Central North Map
